title: Hire Cathy Mulligan | Cyber Security Speaker Agent

time_markers.text: With over 25 years at the forefront of emerging technologies
quotes: With over 25 years at the forefront of emerging technologies, Cathy’s leadership spans high-impact roles in industry, academia and international policy.

organizations.name: Sustainable Society Digital Collective
quotes: Founder of the Sustainable Society Digital Collective, an initiative uniting grassroots digital innovation with global sustainability goals.
